summary: This mod changes how Dragons are approached in Skyrim, making them much tougher to fight without turning them into 1-hit kill death dealing machines.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=5][color=#a52a2a][b]Jehoram\'s Modular Overhaul (JMO)[/b][/color][/size][/u][/center]
[center][size=4][color=#a52a2a][b]Dragons[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=4][b]Current Modules:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10724]Race & Skill[/url][/size][/center]

[size=5][color=#a52a2a][b]Introduction[/b][/color][/size]

I\'ve been playing with the idea of releasing a collection of gameplay tweaks that I have made/are making for my own game but didn\'t really put a lot of thought into it until I saw [url=\"http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1349701-dragon-mods/page__p__20342851\"]this thread[/url]. Most of these mods are highly personalized and loaded into a GameplayTweaks.ESM so I\'m going to be basically recreating them all from scratch. Eventually I\'ll have a single comprehensive list for the whole projects but I\'m going to start out small here with a thread designated for only the Dragon Module. This mod will focus on \"realism\" and being as lore-friendly as possible, although I may include an optional .ESP with dragon hatchlings. Now for the Features...

[color=#a52a2a][b][size=5]Changelog[/size][/b][/color]

[b]Version .1b[/b]

- Dragons soak up much more damage (see readme for specific data)
- Fear Effect on most NPC\'s (excludes guards)
- Unique Dragon stats for Alduin, Paarthurnax, Odaahviing and the Blackreach Dragon

[color=#a52a2a][b][size=5]Suggestions & Questions[/size][/b][/color]

Post them here in the thread and I\'ll do my best to respond in a timely manner. If there\'s something that needs to be asked over PM then I\'m open to it, but try to keep it in the thread if possible.

[size=5][b][color=#a52a2a]Compatibility[/color][/b][/size]

This mod will [b]NOT[/b] be compatible with Deadly Dragons or any other mod that does similar things to Dragons or their spawns.
This mod [b]WILL[/b] be compatible with any and all retextures and remeshes (if their are any) as it doesn\'t affect either of these.
author: Jehoram
